verses.verse: Finally, <WG3063> my<WG3450> brethren,<WG80> rejoice<WG5463> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962> To write<WG1125> the<WG3588> same things<WG846> to you,<WG5213> to me<WG1698> indeed<WG3303> is not<WG3756> grievous,<WG3636> but<WG1161> for you<WG5213> it is safe.<WG804>
Beware <WG991> of dogs,<WG2965> beware<WG991> of evil<WG2556> workers,<WG2040> beware<WG991> of the<WG3588> concision.<WG2699>

For <WG1063> we<WG2249> are<WG2070> the<WG3588> circumcision,<WG4061> which worship<WG3000> God<WG2316> in the spirit,<WG4151> and<WG2532> rejoice<WG2744> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> have no confidence<WG3982> <WG3756> in<WG1722> the flesh.<WG4561>

Though <WG2539> I<WG1473> might also<WG2532> have<WG2192> confidence<WG4006> in<WG1722> the flesh.<WG4561> If any<WG1536> other man<WG243> thinketh<WG1380> that he hath whereof he might trust<WG3982> in<WG1722> the flesh,<WG4561> I<WG1473> more: <WG3123>

Circumcised <WG4061> the eighth day,<WG3637> of<WG1537> the stock<WG1085> of Israel,<WG2474> of the tribe<WG5443> of Benjamin,<WG958> a Hebrew<WG1445> of<WG1537> the Hebrews;<WG1445> as touching<WG2596> the law,<WG3551> a Pharisee;<WG5330>
Concerning <WG2596> zeal,<WG2205> persecuting<WG1377> the<WG3588> church;<WG1577> touching<WG2596> the righteousness<WG1343> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> the law,<WG3551> blameless.<WG273>
But <WG235> what things<WG3748> were<WG2258> gain<WG2771> to me,<WG3427> those<WG5023> I counted<WG2233> loss<WG2209> for<WG1223> Christ.<WG5547>

Yea <WG235> doubtless,<WG3304> and<WG2532> I count<WG2233> all things<WG3956> but<WG1511> loss<WG2209> for<WG1223> the<WG3588> excellency<WG5242> of the<WG3588> knowledge<WG1108> of Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> my<WG3450> Lord:<WG2962> for<WG1223> whom<WG3739> I have suffered the loss<WG2210> of all things,<WG3956> and<WG2532> do count<WG2233> them<WG1511> but dung,<WG4657> that<WG2443> I may win<WG2770> Christ,<WG5547>

And <WG2532> be found<WG2147> in<WG1722> him,<WG846> not<WG3361> having<WG2192> mine own<WG1699> righteousness,<WG1343> which<WG3588> is of<WG1537> the law,<WG3551> but<WG235> that<WG3588> which is through<WG1223> the faith<WG4102> of Christ,<WG5547> the<WG3588> righteousness<WG1343> which is of<WG1537> God<WG2316> by<WG1909> faith: <WG4102>

That I may know<WG1097> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> power<WG1411> of his<WG846> resurrection,<WG386> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> fellowship<WG2842> of his<WG846> sufferings,<WG3804> being made conformable<WG4833> unto his<WG846> death;<WG2288>
If by any means<WG1513> I might attain<WG2658> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG1815> of the<WG3588> dead.<WG3498>

Not <WG3756> as though<WG3754> I had already<WG2235> attained,<WG2983> either<WG2228> were already perfect:<WG5048> <WG2235> but<WG1161> I follow after,<WG1377> if that<WG1499> I may apprehend<WG2638> that for<WG1909> which<WG3739> also<WG2532> I am apprehended<WG2638> of<WG5259> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

Brethren, <WG80> I<WG1473> count<WG3049> not<WG3756> myself<WG1683> to have apprehended:<WG2638> but<WG1161> this one thing<WG1520> I do, forgetting<WG1950> those things which are behind,<WG3694> <WG3303> and<WG1161> reaching forth<WG1901> unto those things which are before,<WG1715>
I press<WG1377> toward<WG2596> the mark<WG4649> for<WG1909> the<WG3588> prize<WG1017> of the<WG3588> high<WG507> calling<WG2821> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

Let us therefore,<WG3767> as many as<WG3745> be perfect,<WG5046> be thus minded:<WG5426> <WG5124> and<WG2532> if in any thing<WG1536> ye be otherwise minded,<WG5426> <WG2088> God<WG2316> shall reveal<WG601> even<WG2532> this<WG5124> unto you.<WG5213>
Nevertheless, <WG4133> whereto<WG1519> <WG3739> we have already attained,<WG5348> let us walk<WG4748> by the<WG3588> same<WG846> rule,<WG2583> let us mind<WG5426> the<WG3588> same thing.<WG846>
Brethren, <WG80> be<WG1096> followers together<WG4831> of me,<WG3450> and<WG2532> mark<WG4648> them which walk<WG4043> so<WG3779> as<WG2531> ye have<WG2192> us<WG2248> for an example.<WG5179>

(For <WG1063> many<WG4183> walk,<WG4043> of whom<WG3739> I have told<WG3004> you<WG5213> often,<WG4178> and<WG1161> now<WG3568> tell<WG3004> you even<WG2532> weeping,<WG2799> that they are the<WG3588> enemies<WG2190> of the<WG3588> cross<WG4716> of Christ: <WG5547>

Whose <WG3739> end<WG5056> is destruction,<WG684> whose<WG3739> God<WG2316> is their belly,<WG2836> and<WG2532> whose glory<WG1391> is in<WG1722> their<WG846> shame,<WG152> who mind<WG5426> earthly things.)<WG1919>

For <WG1063> our<WG2257> conversation<WG4175> is<WG5225> in<WG1722> heaven;<WG3772> from<WG1537> whence<WG3739> also<WG2532> we look for<WG553> the Savior,<WG4990> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

Who <WG3739> shall change<WG3345> our<WG2257> vile<WG5014> body,<WG4983> that it<WG846> may be fashioned<WG1096> like unto<WG4832> his<WG846> glorious<WG1391> body,<WG4983> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> working<WG1753> whereby<WG3588> he<WG846> is able<WG1410> even<WG2532> to subdue<WG5293> all things<WG3956> unto himself.<WG1438>
